items.title: Can Tesla's India plan be a game changer for local auto ancillary manufacturers?
items.description: Since these suppliers were chosen based on quality and cost competitiveness, they could continue exporting to Tesla’s global factories while also supplying the Indian market

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Kotak Mahindra Bank, Zomato, UPL, BSE, Ashok Leyland, and others on February 20?
items.description: The market is expected to gain strength soon amid ongoing range-bound trading. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Top gainers and losers today: Stocks that moved the most on February 19
items.description: On Wednesday, Sensex ended 28.21 points lower while Nifty declined by 12.40 points at closing. IT and pharma were among the losers with banks having rather contributed to a certain pickup in the indices.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty, Sensex make smart recovery from day's low to end flat; mid, smallcaps rally
items.description: Dr Reddy's Labs, TCS, HUL, Infosys, Adani Enterprises were among major losers on the Nifty, while gainers were Bharat Electronics, Hindalco, L&T, Axis Bank, Eicher Motors. BSE Midcap index was up 1.3 percent and Smallcap index added 2.4 percent.

items.title: Live: Sensex recovers 400 pts from day's low, Nifty above 22,900 | Closing Bell
items.description: Sensex recovers 400 pts from day's low. Nifty rebounds over 100 pts from day's low. Broader indices outperform headline indices. Nifty Smallcap index breaks 9-day fall, up 2%. Auto, IT stocks suffer amid Trump's tariff threats. Bank Nifty index limit market losses, led by HDFC Bank. Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: TCS, Infosys, other IT stocks fall up to 3% amid uncertainty over Trump tariffs
items.description: US President Donald Trump on February 13 had announced reciprocal tariffs in a bid to reduce the US' trade deficit with other countries. This move is expected to make investors to move away from export-oriented stocks, including IT and pharma.

items.title: Consumer stocks richly valued despite slower growth because of flight-to-safety attitude of investors, says Anand Shah of Axis Capital
items.description: Anand Shah of Axis Capital says that consumption of staples has a structural growth issue, but discretionary consumption should bounce back on the strength of tax cuts

items.title: Swiggy, Zomato shares recover after Q3 woes, gain up to 14% in 4 sessions; here's what brokerages say
items.description: CLSA has said that Zomato and Swiggy are among its top ideas for the long-term

items.title: CDSL – Should investors consider this stock in a wobbly market?
items.description: The company is a good play on the rising digitalisation in the financial services businesses

items.title: Lupin, Dr Reddy's, other pharma stocks fall on Trump's 25% tariff plans
items.description: Indian drugmakers earn a significant share of revenue from the US, the largest importer of Indian pharma products

items.title: Accumulate Brookfield India Real Estate Trust; target of Rs 312: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services recommended accumulate rating on Brookfield India Real Estate Trust with a target price of Rs 312 in its research report dated February 18, 2025.

items.title: Buy Bajaj Finance; target of Rs 9521: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: Geojit Financial Services is bullish on Bajaj Finance has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 9521 in its research report dated February 18, 2025.

items.title: Aurobindo Pharma shares crash 9.5% as USFDA issues 5 observations for arm's AP facility
items.description: The inspection took place from February 10-18, wherein the US regulator concluded with five procedural observations for  Aurobindo Pharma's arm Eugia Steriles

items.title: RVNL shares jump 11%, snap 3-day losing streak over Rs 554-crore Karnataka project
items.description: Rail Infrastructure Development Company (Karnataka) Limited has placed the order for the construction of 9 stations - 1 elevated and 8 at-grade stations for the Bengaluru Suburban Rail Project (BSRP).

items.title: Airtel block deal: Stake sale proceeds to be used for refinancing loans for BT Group investment
items.description: As per a Nuvama Alternate Research, several institutional investors participated in Bharti Airtel’s recent block deal, with Bharti Telecom Limited leading the stake purchase at 12.05 million shares worth Rs 2,000 crore.
